data.title: Weird noises
data.statement:
You need to display strange sounds created by listed people.

! Any resemblance to real people and events is purely coincidental

We have a 10 great developers: Dav, Lin, Luk, Pat, Seb, Mal, Lks, Mat, Paw, Wik. Everyone has their favourites weird noises. So:

Seb's favourite weird noise is "whasssssuuuuup?"
Wik's favourite weird noise is "helllllo?"
Paw's favourite weird noise is "awwwwwa?"
Mat's favourite weird noise is a copy of Paw's weird noise. If Paw didn't start with his noise then it's empty ("")
For all other developers their favourite weird noise is empty.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You need to display strange sounds created by listed people.

! Any resemblance to real people and events is purely coincidental

We have a 10 great developers: Dav, Lin, Luk, Pat, Seb, Mal, Lks, Mat, Paw, Wik. Everyone has their favourites weird noises. So:

Seb's favourite weird noise is "whasssssuuuuup?"
Wik's favourite weird noise is "helllllo?"
Paw's favourite weird noise is "awwwwwa?"
Mat's favourite weird noise is a copy of Paw's weird noise. If Paw didn't start with his noise then it's empty ("")
For all other developers their favourite weird noise is empty.
Input
Line 1: An integer N for the number of lines
Next N lines: Developer name (1 per line)
Output
Weird noise. 1 per line. Nothing if weird noise is empty.
Constraints
2 ≤ N ≤ 100
Example
Input
7
Seb
Mat
Wik
Paw
Mat
Dav
Mal
Output
whasssssuuuuup?
helllllo?
awwwwwa?
awwwwwa?
